meanings.sent1: The smell of rotten eggs was nauseating.
meanings.sent2: The garbage left in the sun became nauseating.
meanings.sent3: The sight of the messy room was nauseating, but also a bit funny.
meanings.sent4: The constant noise from the construction site was nauseating to her ears.
meanings.sent5: The taste of the spoiled milk was so nauseating that she couldn't finish it.

meanings.definition: Causing a feeling of sickness in the stomach.
meanings.sent1: The roller coaster ride was nauseating for some people.
meanings.sent2: The bumpy boat ride on rough waters was nauseating.
meanings.sent3: The spinning teacup ride was nauseating, but it made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The never-ending turbulence on the flight was nauseating to the passengers.
meanings.sent5: The strong smell of fish in the market was so nauseating that she had to leave.
